snippet.title: Patient 001 Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Locked away in a crumbling asylum teeming with unspeakable horrors, your only lifeline is Dummy—a mysterious, unsettling guide who may be your savior… or your worst nightmare. Can you trust him, or is he leading you deeper into the abyss? Navigate through ever-shifting, procedurally generated terrors that twist your mind and test your sanity. Scavenge for scarce resources, unravel intricate puzzles that defy logic. Immerse yourself in a first-person psychological horror where the line between reality and the game dissolves into a chilling, inescapable nightmare. Will you claw your way to freedom, or is Dummy orchestrating a far darker end for you? The asylum awaits… if you dare.

⬇️Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3277410/Patient001/

⬇️Itch.IO
https://sunil-sutariya.itch.io/patient001
